brand_identity.name: Veritas AI
brand_identity.tagline: Deciphering Truth in the Age of Noise
brand_identity.emotional_tone: The calm confidence of a veteran editor meets the precision of a forensic lab.

headings.usage: Main headlines, section titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for a crisp editorial look.

data.usage: Credibility scores, timestamps, source URLs, raw data snippets.

primary.name: Deep Indigo
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, strong borders.

background.name: Paper White
background.usage: Main background. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF to reduce eye strain and mimic paper.

accent_danger.name: Signal Red
accent_danger.usage: Fake news alerts, high bias indicators.

accent_highlight.name: Editor's Yellow
accent_highlight.usage: Highlighting suspicious text segments (mimics a marker).

landing_page.description: Asymmetric layout. Large serif headlines on the left, interactive 'Scanner' demo on the right.
landing_page.spacing: Generous. Use p-12 to p-24 for section padding.

dashboard.description: Dense, data-heavy. Fixed sidebar, scrollable main content. 3-column grid for analysis results.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or slightly rounded (rounded-md). No pill shapes.
buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-slate-200). No heavy drop shadows. 'Paper' feel.

input_area.style: Massive text area. Minimalist. No border until focus. Feels like a clean sheet of paper.

credibility_meter.description: A horizontal bar gradient from Red to Green. A 'needle' indicates the score. Do NOT use a donut chart.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay (opacity 0.03) on the background to give a tactile paper feel.

motion.scanner: A vertical line scanning down the text content during analysis.
motion.highlight: Text highlights should animate in like a marker stroke (width 0% -> 100%).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Playfair Display' ONLY for H1, H2, H3. Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for everything else.
Implement the 'Scanner' animation when the user submits text. It builds anticipation.
The 'Analysis Result' should look like a forensic report. Use lines, labels, and monospaced data.
Do not use generic 'Success/Error' toasts. Use 'Verification Complete' or 'Analysis Failed' with specific details.
Ensure the 'Highlighter' yellow is readable against the text color.
For the 'Credibility Score', use a scale of 0-100 with clear labels: 'Critical', 'Low', 'Moderate', 'High', 'Verified'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
